title: Message
description: A message between users in a messaging application

messageID.description: The unique identifier of the message.

timestamp.description: The date the message was sent.

time_read.description: The time the message was opened by the recipient.

senderID.description: The unique identifier of the message sender.

recipientID.description: The unique identifier of the message recipient.

recipientGroupID.description: The unique identifier of the message recipient group, if applicable.
